testcase.classname: This feature file covers scenarios related to cart functionality of Jupiter Toys application
testcase.name: [Testcase_3]: Verify subtotal, price and total value of products added to cart
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Jupiter Toys home page....................................passed And I navigate to Shop page.................................................passed When I choose to buy the following products.................................passed And I navigate to Cart page.................................................passed Then I validate the price displayed per product.............................passed And I validate the subtotal per product.....................................passed And I validate the total amount ot be paid..................................passed

testcase.name: [Testcase_1]: Validate error messages for Mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Jupiter Toys home page....................................passed And I navigate to Contact page..............................................passed When I submit the form with the following values............................passed Then I should get the following error messages..............................passed Then I should not get any error messages....................................passed
